code: import*as React from'react';import{ListItem,ListItemAvatar,Avatar,ListItemText,Typography,Button,Stack,Badge}from'@mui/material';import{useRoom}from'../../contexts/ChatRoomsContext';import MailIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Mail";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatListItem=_ref=>{let{room,joined}=_ref;const description=`This is the ${room} group chat`;const{joinRoom,leaveRoom,lastMessage,getNotificationCount}=useRoom();console.log(getNotificationCount(room));const handleJoin=()=>{joinRoom(room);};const handleLeave=()=>{leaveRoom(room);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{alignItems:"flex-start",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemAvatar,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{alt:room,src:"random"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"div",variant:"h5",color:"primary",sx:{display:'inline'},children:room}),secondary:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"span",variant:"subtitle1",color:"secondary",sx:{display:'inline'},children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:lastMessage(room)})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{direction:"column",spacing:2,alignItems:"center",children:[!joined&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:handleJoin,children:"Join"}),joined&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"secondary",onClick:handleLeave,children:"Leave"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Badge,{badgeContent:getNotificationCount(room),color:"secondary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MailIcon,{color:"action"})})]})]});};export default ChatListItem;
